column4: so what does it mean when the wireless connects and can function, but is unbearably slow?
weak signal or low bandwidth
it's not the signal strength, I know that. I'm right next to my desktop PC which is using wireless as well. It's been trying to load this website for over 3 minutes now
are  you using that same connection now with IRC?
yea
on the desktop, laptop is right next to me
ok so then you aren't
oh, yea no it's too slow to work on the laptop
thats how bad the connection is :P
are you doing any torrenting or whatnot with your desktop
nope
what does pinging on the laptop give you
ubuntu has to be the only distro to not have ssh installed default
I pinged www.yahoo.com
I'm getting responses around 45ms
I can load google.com pretty quickly
that is a pretty quick ping
yea, I'm not sure whats going on
I can load google.com
but if I do a search the results never load
just sits there "transfering"
ever heard of anything liek this before bruenig? I'm totally lost at this point
what website is loading so slowly?
